projects.name: Netflix Clone
projects.description: Developed a Netflix clone using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project aimed to replicate the user interface of the popular streaming platform Netflix, providing users with a familiar browsing experience. Implemented features include dynamic content loading, responsive design, and interactive UI elements.

projects.name: Tic Tac Toe Game
projects.description: Designed and implemented a Tic Tac Toe game using HTML and CSS. This project involved creating a classic game of Tic Tac Toe playable in the browser. It features a simple user interface with intuitive gameplay mechanics. The game allows two players to take turns marking spaces on a 3x3 grid, aiming to achieve a row, column, or diagonal of their respective symbols (X or O).

projects.name: Currency Converter
projects.description: Built a currency converter web application using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The application allows users to convert between different currencies, providing real-time exchange rates fetched from an API. Users can input the amount in one currency and select the desired conversion currency, receiving instant conversion results.

full_output.name: Harsh Kumar Singh
achievements_and_awards: Winner of Institutional Level Cricket Tournament (10/2022 - 10/2022)
